1089920.name: Meiro
1089920.description:
Meiro is a Survival Game set in a future where people have grown astray from the technological world and have forgotten how to operate technology and what horrible actions led to this situation.

Explore a deadly Maze



Set out to explore a vast and highly technological maze. Pack up well to try and survive on what scraps you'll find along the way. There's no telling what awaits within the ever changing paths of a living, breathing maze.

Forge your own path



The in-depth skills system allows you to tackle issues in your own way. Craft strong armor and weapons to survive the maze, discover your inner alchemist and create deadly mixtures, rely on your magical talents for protection or mix it up and go for a hybrid build.

Arm yourself for a dangerous journey



Exploit what resources you can find within the habitat. Create armor and weaponry to give yourself a chance to survive the many dangers of the maze. Perhaps you can return with much more advanced materials to make survival likely.

Improvise, Adapt, Overcome



You'll quickly find yourself outmatched by the horrors of the maze. Observe their powers, learn from their technology, advanced your skills until you can use their powers against them.

Uncover the past



What stories have been left to be forgotten within the maze? Will you piece together the puzzle and learn from the mistakes made or choose to ignore what horrible truths await you?




Features

  • Challenge your friends/strangers with online multiplayer, work together in co-op or brave the maze alone.

  • A unique world to explore paired with an in-depth story to discover.

  • Construct your own base big or build small with resources provided by habitat, or resources taken from the horrors of the maze.

  • An extensive skill system, including physical enhancement, various craftsmanships, brewing and magical proficiency.
1089920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
